name: Investigate Windows Sysmon Event
description: Investigates a Windows Sysmon event, and escalates the alert to an ‘Incident’ if malware is detected.

resource.escalationReason: Alert escalated for migation / remidiation process.

message.content:
Aggregate score from VirusTotal is less than threshold.

Alert is a false alarm and can be closed.

⚠️ The aggregate score is more than threshold limit.

Requesting immediate quarantine of host - {{vars.host_name}}

arguments.name: VirusTotal

message.content:
File hash scan result :

Aggregate  score {{vars.result.data.aggregate}}
Scan Result {{vars.result.data.scans.Symantec.result}}
Permalink {{vars.result.data.permalink}}
This alert will be escalated for further remedial and containment actions.

routes.name: Declare Malware Alarm -> Escalating to Incident
Escalating to Incident -> Update Alert Status
Get VT scan on File hash -> Declare Malware
